items.name: Spell
items.description: A Spell is a small portable bottle that holds energy and a mystical fragrance.

items.name: Travel Candle
items.description: Brings opportunities for journeys to learn, connect, travel, heal, and experience truly meaningful trips.

items.name: Spell Gaia
items.description: Spell Gaia channels Earth's primal energy, nurturing balance and connection.

items.name: Special Spell

items.name: Potion
items.description: Magic Potions are bottled spells, working 2-3 times stronger to create desired effects anytime.

items.name: Potion Gaia
items.description: The magical power is x2 as strong as a regular potion.

items.name: Special Potion
items.description:
It is the most powerful potion
(Appears during times of strong energy).
